COMMAND.Name: Suppress
COMMAND.Comment: Suppress sequential readings on eve and day of Nativity and Theophany

COMMAND.Name: Suppress
COMMAND.Comment: Suppress the sequential readings on the Second Sunday before Christmas.

COMMAND.Name: Suppress
COMMAND.Comment: Suppress the sequential readings on the First Sunday before Christmas.

COMMAND.Name: Suppress
COMMAND.Comment: Suppress the Sunday readings on Exaltation and Transfiguration

COMMAND.Name: TransferRulesB
COMMAND.Comment: Daily readings on Transfiguration and Exaltation are moved to the prior day

COMMAND.Name: TransferRulesF
COMMAND.Comment: Daily readings on Transfiguration and Exaltation are moved to the next day

COMMAND.Name: TransferRulesB
COMMAND.Comment: Daily readings are moved back on a Vigil-rank saint occuring M-Sat

COMMAND.Name: TransferRulesF
COMMAND.Comment: Daily readings are moved back on a Vigil-rank saint occuring on a Monday

COMMAND.Name: TransferRulesB
COMMAND.Comment: Daily readings transferred on New Year

COMMAND.Name: TransferRulesF
COMMAND.Comment: Daily readings transferred on New Year
